hero.title: Shaping Culture Through Music
hero.subtitle: Record Label & Music Publishing
hero.description: We are Rocket Science. A music industry powerhouse committed to creativity and innovation, empowering artists and songwriters to reach their full potential globally.

label.title: Rocket Science Music Group
label.description: We identify and develop the most creative and innovative emerging artists, producing and distributing music that pushes boundaries and challenges conventions. Our commitment to artistic freedom and innovation helps shape the future of music.

artistDev.title: Artist Development
artistDev.subtitle: From emerging talent to established stars

distribution.title: Global Distribution
distribution.subtitle: Physical and digital, reaching fans everywhere

publishing.title: Rocket Science Music Publishing
publishing.description: Award-winning publishing administration maximizing the value of musical compositions. We negotiate worldwide licenses, properly register with all organizations, and ensure songwriters and copyright holders receive every dollar they've earned.

launchpad.title: Introducing LAUNCHPAD
launchpad.description: Professional distribution tools for exceptional independent artists, labels, and publishers. Get your music on 100+ platforms and register compositions with PROs worldwide.

process.title: Simple Process
process.subtitle: From submission to success in three steps

steps.title: Submit Your Project
steps.description: Share your music and vision with our A&R team for evaluation.

steps.title: Professional Review
steps.description: Our experts analyze commercial potential and strategic fit.

steps.title: Tailored Partnership
steps.description: We craft a custom approach based on your unique needs.

cta.title: Ready to elevate your career?
cta.subtitle: Join our exclusive roster of exceptional artists and music professionals.

explore.title: Explore LAUNCHPAD
explore.subtitle: Professional distribution tools designed exclusively for established artists, labels, and publishers. Get your music on 100+ platforms worldwide while maintaining complete control.

whatIs.title: What is LAUNCHPAD?
whatIs.description: LAUNCHPAD is our exclusive distribution platform designed for professional artists and labels. Unlike traditional distributors, we offer personalized service, transparent reporting, and strategic support to help you maximize your music's potential.

fast.title: Fast Distribution
fast.subtitle: Get your music live on all major platforms quickly

control.title: Complete Control
control.subtitle: Maintain ownership while reaching global audiences

platforms.title: Global Platform Coverage
platforms.subtitle: Your music available everywhere your fans are listening
platforms.more: Plus 100+ more platforms including regional and specialty services

pricing.title: Simple Commission Model
pricing.subtitle: No upfront fees, no hidden costs. We only succeed when you succeed.

whoUsesIt.title: Who Uses LAUNCHPAD?
whoUsesIt.subtitle: Designed for music professionals who demand excellence

labels.title: Independent Labels
labels.subtitle: Manage multiple artists with enterprise-grade tools

artists.title: Established Artists
artists.subtitle: Take control of your career with professional tools

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.subtitle: Join LAUNCHPAD in three simple steps

steps.title: Apply for Access
steps.description: Submit your application with links to your music and professional background.

steps.title: Get Approved
steps.description: Our team reviews your submission to ensure LAUNCHPAD is the right fit.

steps.title: Start Distributing
steps.description: Access your dashboard and begin distributing your music worldwide.

cta.title: Ready to take control?
cta.subtitle: Join the exclusive group of artists and labels using LAUNCHPAD.

apply.subtitle: Exclusive service by invitation

form.successMessage: Thank you for your submission. Our team will review your application and contact you if we identify a potential opportunity.
form.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again.
form.disclaimer: By submitting this form, you agree that our team will evaluate your submission to determine the best path forward. We will contact you if we identify a potential opportunity.

sections.intro: At Rocket Science LLC, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Digital Distribution Terms
terms.acceptanceText: By submitting your Content, you accept these terms and conditions.

label: Label
writersHelp: Add all writers/composers who contributed to this composition
compositionRegistrationInfo1: Once registered, your composition will be submitted to performing rights organizations (PROs) for royalty collection.
compositionRegistrationInfo2: Make sure all writer information is accurate as it will be used for royalty distribution.
compositionRegistrationInfo3: You will be notified once your composition registration is complete.
paymentNote: Payment details will be used for royalty payouts
